select wd.* from wms_distribution wd left join wms_consignor wc on wc.id = wd.consignor_id and wc.del_flag = '0' left join wms_consignee wc2 on wc2.id = wd.consignee_id and wc2.del_flag = '0' left join wms_car wc3 on wc3.id = wd.car_id and wc3.del_flag = '0' where wd.del_flag = '0'
and ((wd.code like concat('%',#{inputValue},'%'))or(wc.name like concat('%',#{inputValue},'%'))or (wc2.name like concat('%',#{inputValue},'%'))or(wd.operator like concat('%',#{inputValue},'%'))or (wc3.license_plate_number like concat('%',#{inputValue},'%'))or(wd.originating_station like concat('%',#{inputValue},'%'))or (wd.arrival_station like concat('%',#{inputValue},'%')))
AND date_format(wd.billdate,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND date_format(wd.billdate,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by wd.billdate desc
select * from wms_distribution where del_flag = '0' and code = #{code}

select wd.* from wms_distribution wd left join wms_car wc3 on wc3.id = wd.car_id and wc3.del_flag = '0' where wd.del_flag = '0' and wd.sstatus != '0'
and wc3.license_plate_number like concat('%',#{inputValue},'%')
and wd.car_iphone like concat('%',#{carIphone},'%')
AND date_format(wd.billdate,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND date_format(wd.billdate,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by wd.billdate desc

select wd.* from wms_distribution wd left join wms_consignee wc2 on wc2.id = wd.consignee_id and wc2.del_flag = '0' where wd.del_flag = '0' and wd.sstatus != '0'
and wc2.name like concat('%',#{inputValue},'%')
and wd.consignee_iphone like concat('%',#{consigneeIphone},'%')
AND date_format(wd.billdate,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND date_format(wd.billdate,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by wd.billdate desc
